name: Namco Py
description:
A port of the Namco High html vn to Ren'py, supporting modern accessibility features, save files, and rollback.

Namco High was a dating sim developed by What Pumpkin Studios and Date Nighto LLC, and published by ShiftyLook with the proprietary "htmlvn" engine. Namco High was released December 17, 2013, and shut down on July 1, 2014.

See full project at (and submit any bug reports to)  the github page: https://github.com/GiovanH/namco-py
